header: Samaria and Israel to Be Punished

verse: During the time that Jotham [ruled 758–743 bc], Ahaz [ruled 743–727 bc], and Hezekiah [ruled 727–698 bc] were kings of Judah, the word of the Lord came to Micah, who was from Moresheth [a town in southern Judah]. He saw these visions about Samaria and Jerusalem.
